statements: SELECT * FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name ASC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_parameters ->> 'type' = 'ERC20';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_code ILIKE '%transfer%';
SELECT contract_id, contract_parameters FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_parameters ->> 'type' = 'sale' ORDER BY contract_name ASC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_parameters @> '{"status": "active"}' ORDER BY contract_name ASC, contract_code DESC;
SELECT contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name ILIKE '%token%' ORDER BY contract_id DESC;

SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_parameters -> 'expiration_date' AS expiration_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_parameters ->> 'type' = 'subscription' AND contract_parameters -> 'status' = 'active' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC, contract_id DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_parameters FROM smart_contracts_parameters;
SELECT contract_name, contract_id, contract_parameters FROM smart_contracts_parameters WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM contract_executions ORDER BY execution_date DESC;
SELECT executed_by, execution_date, contract_id FROM contract_executions WHERE execution_id = 5;
SELECT contract_id, count(*) as Number_of_Executions FROM contract_executions GROUP BY contract_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts_parameters WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts_parameters WHERE contract_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT executed_by, execution_date FROM contract_executions ORDER BY execution_date DESC;

SELECT contract_id, contract_name, COUNT(*) AS num_executions FROM smart_contracts_parameters JOIN contract_executions ON smart_contracts_parameters.contract_id = contract_executions.contract_id GROUP BY contract_id;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, JSON_VALUE(contract_parameters, '$.key') AS parameter_key FROM smart_contracts_parameters;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts_parameters;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'fee';
SELECT * FROM contract_owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT contract_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM contract_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, contract_name, parameter_value FROM contract_owners JOIN smart_contracts_parameters ON contract_owners.contract_id = smart_contracts_parameters.contract_id;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM smart_contracts_parameters LIMIT 10;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, contract_id FROM contract_owners WHERE owner_name = 'Alice';
SELECT contract_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM contract_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM smart_contracts_parameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE '%date%';
SELECT * FROM contract_owners INNER JOIN smart_contracts_parameters ON contract_owners.contract_id = smart_contracts_parameters.contract_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_contract_parameters;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM smart_contract_parameters WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM contract_rules ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM contract_owners WHERE owner_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT contract_id, event_timestamp, event_details FROM contract_history WHERE contract_id = 2 AND event_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contract_parameters WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM contract_owners WHERE contract_id = 2;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM contract_rules WHERE rule_id = 3;
SELECT contract_id, COUNT(*) FROM contract_history GROUP BY contract_id;
SELECT * FROM contract_history ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_code, contract_parameters FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT execution_timestamp, executed_by FROM contract_execution WHERE executed_by = 'Alice' AND execution_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_description FROM contract_logs WHERE contract_id = 'a123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 'd46cc112-316f-4e11-bf7a-f1c8c1b8d8cb';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE 'C%';
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT cp.parameter_name, ce.execution_timestamp FROM contract_parameters cp JOIN contract_execution ce ON cp.contract_id = ce.contract_id;
SELECT ce.execution_timestamp, ce.executed_by FROM contract_execution ce JOIN smart_contracts sc ON ce.contract_id = sc.contract_id WHERE sc.contract_name = 'Contract1';
